frameDefinitions: A Winner has victory over an Loser.
An Entity undergoes some change (the Event) that is (or is construed as) punctual.
The words in this frame involve an Undesirable_event which affects the Patient negatively.
An Entity changes from one kind of thing (Initial_category) to another kind of thing (Final_category).
While in motion, an Impactor makes sudden, forcible contact with the Impactee, or two Impactors both move, mutually making forcible contact.
An Assailant physically attacks a Victim (which is usually but not always sentient), causing or intending to cause the Victim physical damage.
frameExamples: This <t>happens</t> to me all the time.
The first <t>calamity</t> was a disastrous trade war with Holland.
She <t>metamorphosed</t> from a mere coworker into a friend .
The massive metal foot <t>hit</t> the ground with a huge thud.
As soon as he stepped out of the bar he was <t>set</t> upon by four men in ski-masks.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual or individuals who beat the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The individual or individuals that get beat by the <fen>Winner</fen>.
When the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory over the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory <fen>Loser</fen>.
This role identifies the event which occurs and affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
This role identifies where the event takes place.
The undesirable event which occurs.
The entity that experiences the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen>.
When the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> takes place.
The concrete or abstract entity that undergoes a change.
The type of <fen>Entity</fen> that results from the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> belongs to before it undergoes the change.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the transformation.
The location that the change takes place.
The entity that hits the <fen>Impactee</fen>.
The entity which is hit by the <fen>Impactor</fen>.
The multiple entities that collide.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
This role is the being or entity that is injured by the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Assailant</fen> attacks the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Assailant</fen> makes an assault on the <fen>Victim</fen>.
listRoleExamples: An <fex>environmental</fex> disaster is just what we need.
How pleasing to see that <fex>Scranton</fex> has metamorphosed .
The viccar converted <fex>from a professional clergyman</fex> into an anti-ecclesiastical activist.
<fex>The rock</fex> hit the sand with a thump.
The rock hit <fex>the sand</fex> with a thump.
<fex>The car and truck</fex> collided at a combined speed of over 100MPH.
The mysterious fighter attacked <fex>the guardsmen</fex> with a sabre.
<fex>The mysterious fighter</fex> attacked the guardsmen with a sabre.
<fex>As soon as he stepped out of the bar</fex> he was set upon by four men in ski-masks.
Then Jon-O's forces ambushed them <fex>on the left flank</fex> from a line of low hills.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Kivitoo: What They Thought Of Us
imagineNATIVE Film and Media Arts Festival
